name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 13 Pro Max features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, Pro camera system with 12MP telephoto, wide, and ultra-wide lenses, and ProMotion technology for a smooth user experience.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Galaxy S21 Ultra boasts a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Exynos 2100/Snapdragon 888 chipset, quad-camera setup with a 108MP main sensor, S Pen support, and 5,000mAh battery.

name: Apple iPhone 12
description: The iPhone 12 features a sleek design with Ceramic Shield front cover, A14 Bionic chip, dual-camera system with Night mode, and 5G capability for fast download speeds.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3
description: The Galaxy Z Fold 3 is a foldable phone with a 7.6-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 chipset, triple-camera setup, S Pen support, and IPX8 water resistance.
